titleStmt.title: The cry of a stone. Or A relation of something spoken in Whitehall, by Anna Trapnel, being in the visions of God. Relating to the governors, Army, churches, ministry, universities: and the whole nation. Uttered in prayers and spiritual songs, by an inspiration extraordinary, and full of wonder. In the eleventh moneth, called January. 1653.
titleStmt.author: Trapnel, Anna.

titleStmt.title: The cry of a stone. Or A relation of something spoken in Whitehall, by Anna Trapnel, being in the visions of God.
